OP101.statement: update cuid set id_number = substr(id_number,1,12)||'-001', id_type = '0005' where id_number='<%id_number%>' and id_type='<%id_type%>'

OP102.statement: update cusvdd set id1= substr(id_number,1,12)||'-001', id_type = '0005' where id1='<%id1%>' and id_type='<%id_type%>'

OP103.statement: delete from cuid where id1='<%id1%>' and id_type='<%id_type%>'

OP104.statement: delete from cusvdd where id_number='<%id_number%>' and id_type='<%id_type%>'
